title: Surface matrix regulation of perovskite quantum dots for efficient solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5756-5794
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01629G, Review Article
Shuhuai Xiao, Xinyi Mei, Xiaoliang Zhang
This review comprehensively discusses the latest advances in surface matrix regulation of perovskite quantum dots and proposes the opportunities and challenges of surface matrix regulation for high-performance solar cells.
